Reviews.Title: Pretty good support - Less good product
Reviews.Author: SC Tom
Reviews.Content: SVAT CV502 was purchased about a year ago. When about three months old one camera and that channel of the recorder failed. Everything was plugged into a "line surge suppressor" so, NO, it was not lightning! After a fashion they replaced the defective units ... a real pain to replace custom installed camera and concealed recorder.Now,a second camera has failed ... but that is not the bad news. Every time there is a power outage the system needs to be reconfigured? This is something that takes the better part of an hour because it looses its network identity and requires the attachment of an external monitor and mouse. After the last event (power outage) I realized that I could review the captured video on an external monitor if there was a need. The remaining issues: 1) It is a pain to move a monitor into the walk-in closet, 2)this means that there is no consistent monitoring of the system and 3)the only compatibility is with Microsoft Explorer (lots of luck with internet security).

Reviews.Title: Great user friendly system
Reviews.Author: Bchbumobx
Reviews.Content: This DVR security system is a great product. I have never owned one of these systems, but found it very user friendly to set up and use. The IR night vision cameras work really well in complete darkness and you get a great color picture in daytime recording. I highly recommend this system for home or business use.
